loosely.translation[0].definitions[0].de: in a way that is not firm or tight
loosely.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: A towel was loosely wrapped around his neck.
loosely.translation[0].definitions[1].de: in a way that is not exact
loosely.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The film is loosely based on the novel.
‘El Libre’ was loosely translated as ‘the free one’.
loosely.translation[0].definitions[2].de: in a way that is not strictly controlled or organized
